channel.title: Need help with a couple of things on Pvp Scape
channel.description:
ok ive made a Pvp Scape server and now need to know a few things
1. How do i make myself and others admin/mod on it? i'v tried ::mod 2 but dosnt work
2. How do i change all the things that say Pvp scape to HardcoreScape PK
3. How can people make money on it other than ::starter
Thanks

item.title: Need help with a couple of things on Pvp Scape
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

  1. The command is ::givemod theirName

  2. If you can’t figure that out then it should be left saying PvpScape

  3. Add money making yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a couple of things on Pvp Scape
